department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Estimation and Control of Dynamic Systems
course.description: Study of dynamical systems with deterministic and stochastic inputs. Controllability and observability, linear quadratic control, dynamic programming and the Pontryagin maximum principle, Stochastic models and Kalman-Bucy filtering. Applications from engineering and economics.
course.prerequisites: Linear differential equations, matrix algebra, and introductory probability as covered in Mathematics 21a, b and Engineering Sciences 150 or equivalents.
